definitions.definition: A longing for home or familiar surroundings ; homesickness .
examples: Seeing food at camp similar to his mother's cooking sent a wave of nostalgia through him.

definitions.definition: A bittersweet yearning for the things of the past .

main_definition: ( now uncommon ) A longing for home or familiar surroundings ; homesickness . [from 18th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( transferred sense ) A bittersweet yearning for the things of the past . [from 20th c.]
